info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Hillsdale County through 600 PM EDT... At 524 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Reading, or near Hillsdale, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reading. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
